title: Lisa Haydon: Mommy-to-be Lisa Haydon flaunts her baby bump in her latest picture | Hindi Movie News - Times of India
text: Mommy-to-be Lisa Haydon flaunts her baby bump in her latest picture Lisa Haydon has posted another new picture on Instagram flaunting her baby bump. TNN | Feb 19, 2017, 06.10 PM IST Lisa Haydon always looks pretty as a picture, no matter what she does. In the second week of January, the 'Queen' announced her pregnancy by posing in a bikini, with a prominent baby bump. Now, she has posted another new picture on Instagram flaunting her baby bump. Pics: Lisa Haydon flaunts her baby bump in a bikini Lisa, who has headed off on an all-girls vacay, has shared some stunning pictures of herself. In the picture, the gorgeous actress can be seen in a golden-coloured shimmering gown with a plunging neckline. She is all smiles as she poses with her hubby Dino Lalvani , who looks just as dashing in a cream blazer, black tee and white pants. What adds to Lisa 's beauty is the pregnancy glow that she is exuding - this mommy-to-be is becoming lovelier and more radiant with every passing day. ❤️ A post shared by Lisa Haydon (@lisahaydon) on Feb 18, 2017 at 8:59am PST Newly married Lisa Haydon flaunts baby bump in a bikini 00:16 Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
